profile: At Steam Dry Canada, our customers are our business. Whether it is our carpet, upholstery, area rug, furnace and duct cleaning, indoor air quality division or the flood rescue division, we strive to give our customers superior, detailed and precise results. Our service technicians will provide these superior services with integrity and sincere customer service. We don't send salespeople into our customers homes, we send qualified technicians that are focused on meeting and exceeding our customers expectations. We want to give our customers the most enjoyable in-home service that they have ever received and we are not satisfied until our customers are satisfied, guaranteed.

profile:
Shades of Home is a Family Owned Interior Design/Decor business specializing in Custom Drapery, Sheers and Motorized/Automatic Window Treatments.  

We've been in businesss since 1985 and have assisted thousands of homeowners, designers, builders & renovators with a variety of window treatments and soft furnishings.  Our designers and staff have years of experience AND a passion for what we offer our clients.

Shop by Brand, Hunter Douglas, Shade-O-Matic, Elite, Graber, MaxXmar, SunGlow, Altex, Eclipse, and more. Complete custom drapery with 4000+ designer fabrics, Unlimited styles and price ranges all expertly tailored and installed. And a huge selection of custom drapery hardware and motorization options.

***

WHO WE ARE - over 35 years in the window covering business

We do one thing, and we do it Really, Really Well.

Our DRAPERY SPECIALISTS and workroom can create any soft fabric treatment.  Our showrooms carry a huge selection of designer drapery fabrics for our clients to choose from.  Many of our drapery clients come to us after we have provided 'functional' window treatments in their homes or in their friends home and others have found our showroom on their own.

MAXXMAR offers some of the most innovative and well priced window treatments in the marketplace today.  We offer the full line of MaxXmar window fashions at prices our competition can't beat.

HUNTER DOUGLAS:  We have been a Hunter Douglas dealer for over 20 years.  Both of our showrooms are SHOWCASE SHOWROOMS meaning you will find every Hunter Douglas product on display with staff who can explain every Hunter Douglas option and our volume pricing ensures that it will be unlikely you will find a lower price on you Hunter Douglas Manual and PowerView shades.

SUNGLOW:  Specializing in the manufacturing of Sunscreen roller shades for residential and commercial applications, we offer SunGlow to our clients who are looking for oversized shades not available from Hunter Douglas, Elite or MaxXmar.  Their experience in Somfy motorization, linked shades, height and width makes them one of our key suppliers for commercial and condo applications.

ELITE WINDOW FASHIONS:  Since 1967 this Canadian company has been offering a wide selection of quality window coverings.  Well priced with fabrics similar to Hunter Douglases offerings, including e-motion and Somfy motorization.

MOTORIZATION  We have been selling, installing and programming motorized shades and drapery long before it became an entry level option for automating window coverings - 35 years to be exact.  Knowledge AND experience is an absolute necessity and all of our staff and technical installers are trained.  Not only will the shades be properly installed but also programmed and integrated into a variety of smart home systems.

Our sales approach is one of collaboration.  Our staff is hired for their ability and trained to spend enough time with the client to fully understand their expectations, needs and budget.  Then we can suggest options and allow the client to make the value decision for themselves.

We spend the extra time with each client to ensure they are choosing the right product that will provide solutions to their needs.  We try our best to balance privacy, light control with the right product that fits within the clients budget.

All in all I strive to make the environment and experience as stress-free as possible for my staff and clients.
 
Sincerely,
Stephen Poxon
Marie Iannace
Owners

LOCATIONS

OAKVILLE SHOWROOM - 
Marie Iannace - Custom Drapery & Hunter Douglas Specialist
Jasmina & Leslie - Window treatment Specialists
Steve - Motorization & Home Automation Specialist
Ben, Raj, Izzy and Doug - Installations

TORONTO SALES OFFICE
Marie - Custom Drapery & Window Covering Specialist

profile: Amazing Window Fashions is a one stop shop for all Interior Designers, decorators, Developers, real-estate professionals and consumers. We feature an extensive selection of high quality window covering options to fit varying styles and budgets. We are pleased to offer an outstanding showroom of over 9000 square feet that is outfitted with full size displays, allowing clients to visually comprehend what the window covering looks and feels like. Given the enormous variety and quality of products we carry, the Showroom lends itself to be used by Interior Designers and decorators as a Design Resource Center. Our ongoing partnership between Amazing Window Fashions and the Interior Design community ensures that designers and decorators have easy access to the best window covering selections at preferred pricing. Our affiliation with Workroom By Design gives us the power to produce high quality products in no time, whether you have one window or 800 windows our workroom is equipped to deal with both trade and public needs. Our professional team of experts will assist you with everything you need to complete your project in a timely manner, from check measure to the final installation we do it all, we are very passionate with everything we do. Our goal is to earn your trust and build a long term relationship with your company. You can learn more about us by visiting our website www.amazingwindowfashions.com Hunter Douglas

profile:
Kremer Blinds is a family owned and operated local company that specializes in the finest quality window coverings including blinds, shades, shutters, and drapery.
 
We are proud Canadians and we only use Canadian suppliers and products.
 
Kremer Blinds delivers a full customer service experience:
We provide an in home service where our specialist meets with you at your property and assists you in choosing the right window coverings to suit your needs. We also welcome you to book an appointment for a viewing of our beautiful display in our showroom.
 
After the consultation, our trained team with conduct on site, precise, measurements, followed by a professional installation.
 
Customer Service and Satisfaction is what we aim to achieve in every project. Regardless of the size and type of your project, whether a small, economical project to a high-end mega project, Kremer Blinds treats every project with equal consideration and professionalism. Because of that, we have created our 5 P’s which express what Kremer Blinds’ values are based on:
 
- Professional
- Passionate
- Precise
- Punctual
- Price conscious

The Window Fashions Depot team is proud to share our passion for window coverings with home owners and businesses alike. 

We offer personalized and customized window covering designs that fit your needs and budget. The showroom is equipped with full sized displays, giving you the opportunity to easily see, touch, and compare products. Our experienced consultants are more than happy to work with you to achieve the look you desire, and offer free in-home consultations, with no obligations.

Adding the finishing touches to your space with style!
We carry a large selection of window coverings for every space.
Located in Toronto - we serve Toronto and the GTA.
Contact us for a quote - we are happy to help and be a part of your project.

profile:
As the nation’s #1 window coverings franchise, we give you access to more brands and more fashion-forward styles with window treatment options to fit any budget. Our Style Consultants are dedicated to giving you design help to create a home that reflects your personality, and shows off just how stylish you are.

***

Our extensive selection of window treatments includes Automated Shades, Motorized Blinds, shutters, blinds, roller shades, honeycomb shades, draperies, curtains and even window film. Regardless of the window’s size or shape, you can be rest assured that Budget Blinds Serving Ajax, Pickering & Claremont will have a customized window coverings solution ready for you. 

***

We’ll bring samples and swatches of all types of blinds, fabric and roman shades, plantation/wood shutters, curtains and custom draperies to you, so you can see how they look in your home before you buy. Our in-home consultation beats running from store to store or taking your chances online. We’ll measure your windows, do the ordering, inspect your window coverings on delivery, install them perfectly and empower you with our "No Questions Asked Warranty"†!  It’s never been easier to get exactly what you want. Let’s get started planning your new custom window coverings project today!

profile:
Our humble beginnings date back to 1998, when we originally opened our doors as a fabric shop in the trendy Queen Street West district of Toronto. And believe it or not, that’s still where we are today, after all this time. Times may have changed, our products may have changed, but our commitment to quality products and excellent services have not.

***


The Beginning:

Back when we started, collecting the various pieces to achieve the look you wanted for your home was a task involving a substantial amount of legwork. In those relatively early days of the internet, the convenience of online shopping was still a futuristic pipe dream. Consequently, the enormous amount of time clients would have to invest visiting countless stores for all their home décor was frustrating.

Over the years, we provided many of these clients with unique, quality fabrics with which to make their custom drapery. Our experience with these clients and our fabrics made it only natural to take the next step: expanding our offerings to include custom drapery services. In doing so, we helped to diminish our clients’ frustrations by consolidating some of their efforts, but frustrated they still remained.


The Evolution
It was then that we decided to evolve and become much more than a fabric or drapery store. Realizing that curtains and drapes were not always suitable for all windows and spaces, we decided to provide a more robust selection of window treatments by adding blinds and shades to our product offerings.

Our commitment to quality products and services made our choice of Hunter Douglas blinds and shades an easy one. The quality of their products, backed by a lifetime warranty, was consistent with our own principles and gave us the confidence to offer their products to our clients without hesitation.


The One-Stop Shop
Today, our evolution has brought us to a place where we carry everything you need for home décor, with an emphasis on window coverings. We have an extensive selection of drapery, blinds, shades and shutters as well as drapery hardware. And because home décor is comprised of more than just window coverings, we also carry wallpaper, upholstery and home décor accessories, many of which are custom made and exclusive to our products at Eurofab.

Almost 20 years of experience as well as our robust product offerings are what give us the ability to expertly recommend the perfect window treatments for your home. Add to that the unique drapery fabrics and home décor accents we carry, and you have your one-stop shop for home décor and window coverings.

Speak to one of our design consultants today to find out more and prepare to be inspired.

profile:
Prestige Decor Window Treatments & Upholstery specializes in window treatments, drapery fabrics, upholstery fabrics and furniture upholstery services. With over 200,000 upholstery and drapery fabrics to choose from, our interior designers can help you design the perfect window treatments and matching upholstery for your residential or commercial projects. Our specialty is custom drapery, blind, window shutters and window shades. We design window coverings that fit perfectly in your unique living space, and our prices are hard to beat by our competitors in the Greater Toronto Area.

Our window treatment and furniture upholstery consultants have over 10 years of experience and are experts in finding the perfect fabrics and style for your individual applications. Come to our showroom in Mississauga to view beautiful window treatments and furniture reupholstery. 

***

Call us today to book a free 30 minute in-store consultation. Our window covering and upholstery interior designers will sit with you and show you exactly what you are looking for.
